name: ScrapeDefense
description:
In a time where conflict is bestown upon entire continents, some are hit harder than others. Some earthlings can only spew hatred and wants only to destroy what they cannot understand. Your hometown, a city of 25 milion inhabitants was knocked out by a powerful EMP blast.

And this just mere minutes before the surface attack commenced. In all it's horrifying scale of magnitude. Your city was the cultural center of your country, a city that millions of tourists visits every year. At least this was the case before yesterday. With your city so technologized this blast shook the most awake...

You take on the role of a soldier specialized in ancient weapons. Your skill is well known far and wide among your colleagues. The soldier is good at targeting the enemies, the gun is not that good. It can deteriorate quite badly if hit by any modern weapons. This gun is about 60+ years old, and starts to get a bit rusty. I hope you're up for the task...

Features

  • Procedurally generated cities. Each game is unique.
  • Day and night cycles.
  • Power-ups to help you out in your struggle.
  • Intelligent enemies aiming for you.
  • 7 difficulties ranging from very easy to extreme.
